definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

sentences.english: Clean your trolley and refill the guest supplies and linen, empty and clean your vacuum cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 清潔服務車並補充客用品及布草，清理吸塵機。

sentences.english: A multifunctional suction nozzle of a dust suction machine belongs to the field of environmental sanitation machinery.
sentences.chinese: 吸塵機的多功能吸嘴，屬於環衛機械領域。

sentences.english: Clean the carpet of office area correctly according to the usage of vacuum cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 按照吸塵機使用方法正確的清潔辦公室地毯。

sentences.english: Today, in Brazil, sales of vacuum cleaners have to look more beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 今時今日，在巴西銷售的吸塵機外型也要更加美觀。

sentences.english: Remove dust completely from the carpet to be cleaned by vacuum cleaner first.
sentences.chinese: 首先用吸塵機將地毯完全除塵。

definition: a device used to check money and detect counterfeit bills
to force sb to buy or sell/to trade using coercion
to ignore/to brush off/to dismiss/to pay no attention to
lit. to lead away a goat while passing by (idiom)/fig. to opportunistically pocket sb's possessions and walk off
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
